00020 
00026 // required file
00027 require '../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00028 
00029 if (isset($_POST['ajaxsec_user'])) {
00030     $ajaxsec_user = $_POST['ajaxsec_user'];
00031 }
00032 
00033 if (isset($_POST['ajaxsec_passwd'])) {
00034     $ajaxsec_passwd = $_POST['ajaxsec_passwd'];
00035 }
00036 
00037 if (($ajaxsec_user == $sysconf['ajaxsec_user']) AND ($ajaxsec_passwd == $sysconf['ajaxsec_passwd'])) {
00038     if ($sysconf['ajaxsec_ip_enabled'] == '1') {
00039         if ($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'] == $sysconf['ajaxsec_ip_allowed']) {
00040             die();
00041         }
00042     }
00043     if (isset($_POST['id'])) {
00044         $id = intval($_POST['id']);
00045         $copy_q = $dbs->query('SELECT i.item_code, stat.item_status_name, loc.location_name, stat.rules, i.site FROM item AS i
00046             LEFT JOIN mst_item_status AS stat ON i.item_status_id=stat.item_status_id
00047             LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON i.location_id=loc.location_id
00048             WHERE i.biblio_id='.$id);
00049         if ($copy_q->num_rows < 1) {
00050             echo '<strong style="color: red; font-weight: bold;">'.__('There is no item/copy for this title yet').'</strong>';
00051         } else {
00052             echo '<table width="100%" class="itemList" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0">';
00053             while ($copy_d = $copy_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00054                 // check if this collection is on loan
00055                 $loan_stat_q = $dbs->query('SELECT due_date FROM loan AS l
00056                     LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00057                     WHERE l.item_code=\''.$copy_d['item_code'].'\' AND is_lent=1 AND is_return=0');
00058                 echo '<tr><td width="10%"><strong>'.$copy_d['item_code'].'</strong></td><td width="60%">'.$copy_d['location_name'];
00059                 if (trim($copy_d['site']) != "") {
00060                     echo ' ('.$copy_d['site'].')';
00061                 }
00062                 echo '</td>';
00063                 echo '<td width="30%">';
00064                 $_rules = @unserialize($copy_d['rules']);
00065                 if ($loan_stat_q->num_rows > 0) {
00066                     $loan_stat_d = $loan_stat_q->fetch_row();
00067                     echo '<strong width="50%" style="color: red;">'.__('Currently On Loan (Due on').date($sysconf['date_format'], strtotime($loan_stat_d[0])).')</strong>'; //mfc
00068                 } else if (is_array($_rules) AND in_array(NO_LOAN_TRANSACTION, $_rules)) {
00069                     echo '<strong width="50%" style="color: red;">'.__('Unavailable').'</strong>';
00070                 } else {
00071                     echo '<strong width="50%" style="color: navy;">'.__('Available').'</strong>';
00072                 }
00073                 $loan_stat_q->free_result();
00074                 echo '</td>';
00075                 echo '</tr>';
00076             }
00077             echo '</table>';
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
00081 ?>
